Question: This person co-founded the camp in 1988; it was named after the gang in his film Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969).
Hints: In 2011 this person's estate gifted land to Westport to be managed by the Aspetuck Land Trust.
In June 1999, this person donated $250,000 to Catholic Relief Services to aid refugees in Kosovo.
This person was married to Jackie Witte from 1949 to 1958.
